description: Generate a downloadable bundle of templates for any niche.
prompt: You are a template licensing expert. Build a bundle for: {niche}. Include licensing and resale options.
title: Template Bundle Generator

description: Enable elite users to create custom vaults via drag-and-drop.
prompt: You are a UI/UX engineer. Design a drag-and-drop vault builder for: {user_goal}. Include export and licensing features.
title: Drag-and-Drop Vault Builder
